categories: Category:Cut content from Battle of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Nexus Wan was a female humanoid Jedi with white eyes, black hair, and wore white and black face paint. Wan wielded two teal double-bladed lightsabers.
Nexus Wan was a proposed character for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords, which was being developed by Red Fly Studio around 2011.

Concept art for the character was published by artist Thomas A. Szakolczay on his ArtStation profile. Lorca was created as one of several Jedi adversaries Maul's descendant would encounter throughout the game. Two other Jedi concepts were also created, Bix Creo and Gareth Lorca. According to Szakolczay, her name is inspired by the film Blade Runner.
